verbs.description: [ARGM-TMP: For months] , [ARG0: Republicans in Congress] [ARGM-MNR: desperately] [V: fought] [ARG2: for a release of former FBI Director James Comey ’s memos about Donald Trump] [ARGM-PNC: in hopes that there was]
For months , Republicans in Congress desperately fought for a release of former FBI Director James Comey ’s memos about Donald Trump in hopes that there [V: was]
